wrong-network.title: Wrong network
wrong-network.subtitle: The current page is not available on {value}

in-progress.title: Transaction in progress
in-progress.description: This transaction is expected to take a few seconds to complete. Do not close this when it's in process

failed.title: Transaction failed
failed.description: Transaction has been reverted by the EVM

perfomance-table.deposit-tooltip: The total value of deposits in US dollars
perfomance-table.expect-annual-tooltip: The expect annual yield is an weighted average return of all the pool you have participated
perfomance-table.rewards-claimable-tooltip: Please note: this fee applies to staking rewards/earnings only, and is NOT taken from your staked amount. It is a fee on earnings only.

vault-header.deposit-tooltip: The total amount of tokens you have deposited into the pool
vault-header.yield-tooltip: The estimate of earned yield or unclaimed rewards generated from the deposits (principal)
vault-header.currency-tooltip:
You can choose a display currency for all products
  • USD (Assets value equivalent to US Dollar)
  • Token (for example: aBNBc, aMATICb, etc.)
  • Coin (for example BNB, MATIC, etc.

deposit.title: {unit} Deposit
deposit.reward-fee-tooltip: Please note: this fee applies to staking rewards/earnings only, and is NOT taken from your staked amount. It is a fee on earnings only.
deposit.apr-tooltip: The Stability Pool will liquidation fees from Helio. Ceros Protocol will keep the liquidation fees, buyback CEROS tokens and distribute the Stability Pool rewards in CEROS tokens. This will allow Stability Pool liquidity providers to benefit from a more stable yield.

withdraw.title: Withdraw
withdraw.reward-fee-tooltip: Please note: this fee applies to staking rewards/earnings only, and is NOT taken from your staked amount. It is a fee on earnings only.
withdraw.claim-yield-tooltip: By clicking on this switch button you will receive Yield and all Principal by one transaction.
withdraw.you-will-receive-tooltip: The redemption price of caBNBc and aBNBc changes over time to the same pace as the aBNBc ratio from the liquid staking provider. As the Yield Converter allows you to claim the yield portion of reward bearing tokens, the amount of aBNBc that you can redeem with the yield converter vault token will decrease over time, but the remaining amount (yield portfolio) can be claimed anytime separately.
withdraw.all-other-tokens: All other tokens will be converted into USB upon withdrawal

claim.title: Claim
claim.reward-fee-tooltip: Please note: this fee applies to staking rewards/earnings only, and is NOT taken from your staked amount. It is a fee on earnings only.
claim.claim-yield-tooltip: By clicking on this switch button you will receive Yield and all Principal by one transaction.
claim.you-will-receive-tooltip: The minimum amont of deposit token you will receive upon withdrawal

connect.title: Please connect your wallet to continue
connect.subtitle: Required network
